thread.title: Bruins GM denies rumors regarding coach Claude Julien's job security
thread.title_full: Bruins GM denies rumors regarding coach Claude Julien's job security

author: Here's What Westboro Thinks of Kim Davis
title: Bruins GM denies rumors regarding coach Claude Julien's job security
text:
Bruins GM denies rumors regarding coach Claude Julien's job security FOXSports 10 hrs ago Â© Getty Images BOSTON, MA - APRIL 20: Head coach Claude Julien of the Boston Bruins looks on from the bench in the first period against the Detroit Red Wings during the game at TD Garden on April 20, 2014 in Boston, Massachusetts. (Photo by Jared Wickerham/Getty Images) Oddsmakers and newspaper columnists alike have cast doubt on Bruins coach Claude Julien's potential to keep his job, but Bruins GM Don Sweeney continues to deny rumors that the coach is on the hot seat.
AdChoices NESN reported during Saturday's broadcast of the Bruins' game against Arizona that Sweeney had shot down any talk about firing Julien and told NESN , "There is no such thing happening within the organization and that these talks were not happening internally."
The rumors about Julien possibly being fired imminently have calmed down as the Bruins swept a two-game road trip to Arizona and Colorado to move to 2-3-0 on the season. However, the lack of confidence in this Bruins team among the fanbase is sure to keep Julien's job security a trending topic whenever the team struggles.
(h/t Stanley Cup of Chowder )
